issue.title: ring.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://ring.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fring.com) ### Comment > With adguard enabled, some applications do not connect online and become useless. > Ring application - no online access to view events from the camera. > Typeapp for e-mail - doesn't pick up e-mails and doesn't synchronize, > Xvideos.com - I have a message that there is no connection to the network. > Previously, these apps worked fine. ### Screenshots
